classMapping.nameQuery: SELECT (SELECT [database_id] FROM sys.databases WHERE [name] = N'{db}') , S.[{subobject_source_id}] AS [subobject_name] FROM {db}.sys.schemas AS S ;
SELECT S.[{object_source_id}] AS [object_name] , T.[{subobject_source_id}] AS [subobject_name] FROM {db}.sys.tables AS T INNER JOIN {db}.sys.schemas AS S ON T.[schema_id] = S.[schema_id] ;
SELECT S.[{object_source_id}] AS [object_name] , V.[{subobject_source_id}] AS [subobject_name] FROM {db}.sys.views AS V INNER JOIN {db}.sys.schemas AS S ON V.[schema_id] = S.[schema_id] ;
SELECT S.[{object_source_id}] AS [object_name] , P.[{subobject_source_id}] AS [subobject_name] FROM {db}.sys.procedures AS P INNER JOIN {db}.sys.schemas AS S ON P.[schema_id] = S.[schema_id] ;

SELECT S.[{object_source_id}] AS [object_name] , F.[{subobject_source_id}] AS [subobject_name] FROM {db}.sys.objects AS F INNER JOIN {db}.sys.schemas AS S ON F.[schema_id] = S.[schema_id] WHERE F.[type] IN (N'FN', N'FT', N'IF') ;
SELECT T.[{object_source_id}] AS [object_name] , C.[{subobject_source_id}] AS [subobject_name] FROM {db}.sys.tables AS T INNER JOIN {db}.sys.columns AS C ON T.[object_id] = C.[object_id] ;
SELECT V.[{object_source_id}] AS [object_name] , C.[{subobject_source_id}] AS [subobject_name] FROM {db}.sys.views AS V INNER JOIN {db}.sys.columns AS C ON V.[object_id] = C.[object_id] ;
SELECT P.[{object_source_id}] AS [object_name] , M.[{object_source_id}] AS [subobject_name] FROM {db}.sys.procedures AS P INNER JOIN {db}.sys.parameters AS M ON P.[object_id] = M.[object_id]

SELECT F.[{object_source_id}] AS [object_name] , M.[{subobject_source_id}] AS [subobject_name] FROM {db}.sys.objects AS F INNER JOIN {db}.sys.parameters AS M ON F.[object_id] = M.[object_id] WHERE F.[type] IN (N'FN', N'FT', N'IF')
